content.title: Insta360 X4 Standard Bundle - Waterproof 8K 360 Action Camera, 4K Wide-Angle Video, Invisible Selfie Stick Effect, Removable Lens Guards, 135 Min Battery Life, AI Editing, Stabilization
content.bullet_points:
IMMERSIVE 360 VIDEO - The 8K era is here. Insta360 X4 delivers 360° video in stunning 8K or 5.7K60fps! Use Active HDR to keep shots color accurate too, even in action scenarios.
SIMPLE, EASY REFRAMING - With Insta360 X4, get out there and shoot, not having to worry about lining up a shot. Shoot first, then reframe easily after, all in the AI-powered Insta360 app.
INVISIBLE SELFIE STICK EFFECT - The signature third-person Insta360 shot, a specialty of 360 cameras. Immerse your viewers in obstruction-free 360° video, just like you're using a drone or as if you have your own film crew. (Note: The stick is not included in Standalone Version)
4K & 170° MAXVIEW - X4 can also be used as a wide-angle 4K action camera at a whopping 4K60fps, or get super wide views with the incredible 170° MaxView at 4K30fps.
ULTRA STABLE FOOTAGE - FlowState Stabilization and 360° Horizon Lock deliver smooth, level shots, no matter how intense the action is.
SMARTER, RUGGED BUILD - X4 withstands bumps and hardcore action like a pro. The lens guards are also upgraded, now easier to apply and remove on the go.
COLD RESISTANT & WATERPROOF - X4 can handle temperatures as low as -4ºF (-20ºC) with ease. You can also take X4 down to 33ft (10m) without a dive case or 164ft (60m) with the Invisible Dive Case.
IMPROVED 2290MAH BATTERY, FAST CHARGING - Compared to Insta360 X3, X4 offers 67% longer run time. Capture up to 135 minutes on one charge, with fast charging to get back out there faster than ever.
2.5" GORILLA GLASS TOUCHSCREEN - X4 is equipped with an ultra bright 2.5" touchscreen with strong Corning Gorilla Glass. Rock solid protection that's easy to use and control.
IN THE BOX - 1x Insta360 X4, 1x Type-C to Type-C Cable, 1x Standard Lens Guards, 1x Lens Cloth, 1x Protective Pouch, 1x User Guide.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Camera!!
reviews.author: Al
reviews.content: I am still learning how to use the editing tools. It is a bit complex but the camera and video images are top notch ... So if I get it wrong I just start over. Very easy to use and fits right in the pocket for travel. I wish they had a class on this as the on line videos are still a bit over my head but I'm getting there. Coolest camera ever. Read more
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2024
reviews.review_from: Top reviews from the United States
reviews.product_attributes: Style: Get-Set Bundle -No Micro SD Card

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such A Fun Camera to Explore & Capture Your Piece of The World
reviews.author: J P
reviews.content: The Inst360 camera has been fun to use. The camera’s image stabilization impressed me most. I attached the camera to my mobility scooter and went for a “walk” around the neighborhood. I was worried about the video recording as I saw the camera swaying atop the extended pole mount while I went over sidewalk joints. I was extremely pleased to see that the resulting video was smooth as butter. What can be overwhelming is the amount of accessories that can be purchased to mount and use the camera, but that’s also a good thing since there’s so many use applications. I would like to see a car headrest mount made so I can have the camera directly above the center of my mobility scooter. The camera feels very solid in-hand and well-built. The phone app works well. The Insta360 GPS watch-like accessory is not necessary but does offer solid GPS data to the camera and frees up your phone from having to do that job. The customizable GPS data overlays on the video are really cool to view speed and other stats while the video plays. I’m still experimenting with Google Street View uploads and my suggestion is to set the appropriate time zone to match what time the GPS satellites overhead are using so there won’t be time conflicts that may result in an upload error to Street View. Seeing your imagery on Google Street View is fun and it’s great being able to contribute data of parks, trails, parking lots, and streets that may have no Street View data or no recent data. The Insta360 team are great in responding and assisting with issues and that is reassuring for such a big investment. Lastly, the battery life compared to the size of the camera is great. Read more
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 25, 2024
reviews.review_from: Top reviews from the United States
reviews.product_attributes: Style: Standard Bundle -No Micro SD Card

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, is it right for you?
reviews.author: Robert Harrison
reviews.content: The Insta360 X4 is a solid choice for capturing 360 video, especially if you’re into hiking or cycling. The 8k was a big selling point for me. It’s waterproof but I only use it in the rain rarely. The app offers a lot of editing options, though it takes a bit to get a handle on it. The touchscreen could be larger, but it’s still manageable. Overall, it’s a bit pricey, but the quality makes it worth considering if you have a use for it. Read more
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2024
reviews.review_from: Top reviews from the United States
reviews.product_attributes: Style: Standard Bundle -No Micro SD Card

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 360 Degree Camera
reviews.author: Jimlad
reviews.content: Not cheap, but a great gadget that I took on my recent USA coast to coast ride. Got some awesome footage! The camera was attached to the included “action selfie stick” clamped to my handle bars. The software cleverly removes the stick from the images. So yes, the picture above that looks like it was taken by a drone flying behind me is actually from the fully extended stick on my handlebars. Really slick bit of kit and captured some really cool memories from my epic ride. 100% recommend!! Read more
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States November 14, 2024
reviews.review_from: Top reviews from the United States
reviews.product_attributes: Style: Motorcycle Bundle +256GB Micro SD Card

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great device that works as advertised. But: you need a POWERFUL computer or phone to edit footage.
reviews.author: Ron M.
reviews.content: Everything has been working very well so far. About 2 weeks of taking random footage walking, cycling, and some tripod timelapse footage.You need a powerful computer to edit videos. Recommended RAM is 32GB. Sometimes video projects won't finalize properly, or at all. Transitions and edit can go missing or get messed up, and a few times the final video was cut short.None of this is the fault of the camera itself, though I'm sure the insta360 Studio software could use optimization, and it should have ALL the same features as the phone app!My phone won't even attempt to edit videos with the insta360 app. It tells me straight up it doesn't have the performance and won't even make an attempt to edit.This may have focused on more negatives than positives, but I stand by the 5 star rating. Everything works perfectly and as expected, there are a ton of features and the images are all high-quality. They perfected the X series cameras with this. Longer battery life and built-in/removable/replaceable lens protectors are great. I've never had overheating issues yet, filming mostly on a bike going 10-16mph (16kph-25.75kph) in sunny, 74F (23.33C) weather. Read more
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2024
reviews.review_from: Top reviews from the United States
reviews.product_attributes: Style: Motorcycle Bundle +256GB Micro SD Card

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seemless 3D Photos, easy, image a bit noisy in sub-perfect lighting
reviews.author: RedRob
reviews.content: Bought the X4 360 to create 3D virtual tours, after trying to use 360-pano-stitch apps on my excellent new Samsung phone... the apps I was using did an 85% good job with stitching but I really wanted a 100% great option.The Good:- Flawless 360 Photos (stitching-wise)- Easy to use- Good battery life- Nice color- Disappearing selfie stick.. neat.. it works!The Less-good:- App "live view" periodically is glitchy and not refreshing well.. captured image is fine though- Grain shows in the image when used indoors if not perfectly bright lighting. I attribute this to the 1/2" sensor size instead of larger 1" ... this kinda stinks :(- When creating my tour, I used the official selfie-stick to hold the camera (and app to trigger), but the small tripod screwed into the base still showed (would love for it to magically make that disappear too if possible). Still amazing the selfie-stick vanishes :-) Read more
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2024

Incluye bolsa de transporte de la cámara, paño de limpieza y protectores de lentes que no vienen en la imagen ni en la descripción. Read more
